Source.Name: mkinitramfs
Source.Summary: A tool to create the initramfs image
Source.Description: mkinitramfs contains a tool to create the initramfs image with busybox.

Update.Comment: Make sure /lib32 dir is available if exists Add support for wiping memory in initramfs with wipememopts and wipemem parameters
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: - Correctly handle single,s,S keywords from /proc/cmdline, - Don't spawn plymouth while in single-user.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Fix booting issues when installation target is external usb (#16433)
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: Fix booting issues when resume= is not available (#16320)
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Fix wrong operator usage
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: - Improve and fix suspend-to-disk handling, - Add current Plymouth theme's files into initramfs.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Disable probing raid devices as incremental in installation.
Update.Name: Mete Alpaslan

Update.Comment: Run depmod on build system, if modules.dep is not found, to prevent a race condition with pakhandler Change firewire module names, by Ozan Remove bootsplash, by Ozan
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: - Probe KVM virtio devices dynamically (#15180), - Probe RAID devices when liveimage is booted.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Handle PAE kernels too
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Add pakhandler to automatically generate an initramfs for some path matches.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Kill any running plymouth instances before dropping to console in initramfs Load uvesafb module when KMS is not supported Remove HAS_MASS_STORAGE stuff and use new plymouth commands
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: Revert latest changes since this is suspected about the boot problems we have now.
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Make sure some base files are used from rootdir, if defined
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Mass rebuild for Pardus 2011 Beta
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: Probe virtio before any other drive probing
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix disktype warning on live systems
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Busybox is an external package now, depend on it Use new busybox path in mkinitramfs Set version to 1.0.0 , we will continue from here
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Allow blacklisting modules with blacklist= option in kernel command line
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: Add a workaround for systems that don't have splash, correct fix fill follow later on
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Minor version bump
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix variables for config and cmdline parsers Probe filesystem type for live system, remove static fs module loading
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Re-enable udhcpc
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Create lib64 symlink in initramfs
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Fix LiveMedia mounts
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Switch to 1.16, enable btrfs support.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: - Add /etc/profile for aliases and PS1 string, - Use initramfs=shell/shellnoprobe for not garbling root= value.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Drop floppy patch, enable fancy prompts.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Add hotplug helper
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Handle aliases as well, sync initramfs from trunk.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Add dmesg logging for initramfs
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Add copytoram parameter for live boot Allow setting configfile in commandline Add blacklist support, add floppy to blacklist by Ozan
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Make modprobe aware of /proc/cmdline parameters
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Fix livemedia strip
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Switch to new livemedia system Add /etc/initramfs.d folder and /etc/initramfs.conf.example
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Touch livemedia for userspace Use full path for modinfo in mkinitramfs, by Ozan
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Version bump to latest bugfix release
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Search mdadm in sbin to make raid support work, thanks to Taner Change sleep to usleep for faster boot, by Ozan
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Make udhcp request root-path from dhcpd
Update.Name: Faik Uygur

Update.Comment: Enable udhcp (by Faik) Add network, firmware, rootdir support to mkinitramfs
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Switch to python version of mkinitramfs
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Enable date and usleep commands.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Sync init from trunk for the cut versus # changes Add UUID support
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Sync init from trunk.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Add --no-floppy parameter to findfs to skip floppy devices.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Bump busybox to 1.14.1 to fix the floppy issue.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Fix dhcp client requesting via MAC ID
Update.Name: Taner Taş

Update.Comment: Bump busybox to 1.13.4.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Bump busybox to 1.13.3.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Fix typo in virtio to really fix bug #8064
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Make sure we create fb0 device node, we need it for userspace tools
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Allow addition of virtio and xen modules, xen is not added automatically, fixes bug #8064, parse multiple options in mudur= parameters
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix tty device nodes (Onur), remove loop modprobe as it is in kernel now (Ekin)
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Include all splash theme resolutions in initramfs (partial fix for #7117) Use tcp option by default on NFS mounts in thin client setups
Update.Name: Ekin Meroğlu

Update.Comment: Make root=shell probe for hardware and add root=shellnoprobe support, fixes bug #8063
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Add ext2/ext3 support for livedisks in initramfs
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix asm/page.h inclusion, compile with new kernels
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Add support for probing filesystems (vfat for now) for livedisks, fixes bug #7113
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Add module support for loop and squashfs
Update.Name: Ekin Meroğlu

Update.Comment: Merge from playground, add s2ram support, remove dsdt and gensplash supports
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Put busybox in /lib/initramfs
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Make sure additional module dirs like extra, acerhk etc. can be added to initramfs
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Support LABEL in root, probe rootfs type, autodetect new kernel versions and make necessary changes, bootsplash support, fix s8x module, do not use static tempfiles, cleanup the code
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Use mdadm dynamically
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Add sky2 to ethernet modules
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Add missing raid kernel modules
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Merged Çağlar's raid work
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Merged Faik San's hostname patch for thinclient
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Merged Faik San's thinclient work
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix a race condition of creating device nodes in live systems, fixes bugs #5225 and #5276
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Do not print messages when there is no resume device
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix a typo
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Write resume device into sys for SATA disks
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Added vfat,ntfs and unionfs modules to initramfs, to make livedisk work (might help bug #4409)
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Probe drivers 5 times, until the necessary devices are found, fixes bug #3711
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: modify fstab of live images from initramfs, to make sure cdrom mount stuff is in /etc/mtab
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Rename module-name to module_name to get rid of modules alias and map file mismatches, should fix bug #3711
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Modprobe converts module names - to _ as modules.alias does it so, fixes bug #3711
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Revert last until its fixed
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Bump busybox
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Write coolplug dependency
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Add /media to live boots
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Compress initramfs + boot from media other than pata cdroms
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Tidy up + add cdboot functions
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Just works (tested with 4 machines), at last
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: make root-dir work
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Add root-dir option, conflict with mkinitrd
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Add output option, disable compression temporarily
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Revert last
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Turn back to link hack
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Instead of link hack create needed dirs so ensure consistency
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Now identical to old mkinitrd (oscar goes to Onur), DSDT and fbsplash converted to options
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: First release with DSDT and framebuffer support
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur
